content: In fact, you'll find him just to the right of the large inner courtyard leading up to the Mahavira Hall Shrine where Yellowbrow awaits. After defeating the two Dark-faced Overlords guarding the courtyard, you'll find him in a small building standing over a Meditation Spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Pure.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Pure', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Pure'.
The content is as follows:
In fact, you'll find him just to the right of the large inner courtyard leading up to the Mahavira Hall Shrine where Yellowbrow awaits. After defeating the two Dark-faced Overlords guarding the courtyard, you'll find him in a small building standing over a Meditation Spot.
